pageContext.title: Magic Stone Dog (w/Magic Rock & Stone Brewing Co.)
pageContext.tagline: Session Farmhouse IPA - Stone / Magic Rock Collab.
pageContext.description: A session IPA brewed with a diverse grain bill, hopped with Simcoe and Amarillo and fermented with saison yeast, for an incredible level of depth in a low ABV beer. Spicy, fruity, complex, refreshing and dry.
pageContext.author: Sam Mason <samjbmason>
